org.apache.juneau.microservice.resources

Class ConfigResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.juneau.rest.RestServlet
          • org.apache.juneau.rest.BasicRestServlet
            • org.apache.juneau.microservice.resources.ConfigResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, BasicRestConfig

    @RestResource(path="/config",
              title="Configuration",
              description="Contents of configuration file.",
              htmldoc=)
public class ConfigResource
extends BasicRestServlet
    Shows contents of the microservice configuration file.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        String section,

            path="/{section}/{key}",
            summary="Update config entry value",
